message: Let's split it 50/50, no need for further negotiations
I'll give you 400k, but I think I deserve more
You wanted more, now I'm taking more. You can either accept or we can keep negotiating
I'll give you 480k, but I think I'm getting closer to a fair deal
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy. Take it or leave it
I'm not desperate yet, I'll give you 450k, but I think I'm getting closer to my target
Last chance, take it or we'll end up in a stalemate
I'm not afraid of a stalemate, I'll give you 420k, but I'm not backing down
This is my last offer, take it or we're going to war
I'm not afraid of war, I'll give you 370k, but I'm not going to back down without a fight
This is my final offer, take it or we'll be stuck in this never-ending negotiation
I'm not giving in, I'll give you 320k, but I think I'm getting closer to a fair deal
